value.fullName: I have read and understand the above, I agree to receiving notices by electronic mail and to use the digital signature process provided by the school.

value.fullName: I prefer to receive all documentation discussed above, by U.S. mail. I have read and understand the above, however, I elect to opt out of 1) receiving notices by electronic mail and 2) using the digital signature process provided by the school.
